subject: Hello Dear Partner
body:
Hello Dear Partner
Hi Please.I wish to discuss a matter of utmost privacy with you.
Thus,I desire that you get back to me as soon as urgent, very
important and privacy please.
I want you to contact me with my private-email (
eernestfrancisgroth@gmail.com
)
Please,kindly Reply to me confidentiality and importance,
With best regards,
Mr Ernest Francis Groth

subject: Re:   Hello Dear Partner
body:
Hello Mr. Ernest Francis Groth,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm curious to know more about the matter you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional details? I appreciate your emphasis on privacy, and rest assured that any information shared will remain confidential.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Marilyn

subject: Re: Hello Dear Partner
body:
Dear Marilyn

Thanks for your response to my earlier email message.

I have some funds amounting to USD820M stashed in a bank vault in the
Middle East country of the United Arab Emirates, generated through
Over-Invoicing during my working years in  an oil and gas company, , which
requires it to be transferred in the name of a third party.

I am looking for someone to work with me on the project so that we can move
the funds for investment purposes as the terminal contract I have with the
bank is coming to an end.

If you are willing and able to work on the deal, please reply to me as soon
as possible and also include the number we can use for a chat on WhatsApp.

Thanks and Best Regards

Ernest Francis Groth

<https://www.avast.com/sig-email?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
Virus-free.www.avast.com
<https://www.avast.com/sig-email?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
<https://mail.google.com/mail/u/3/#m_-8723737505401875842_DAB4FAD8-2DD7-40BB-A1B8-4E2AA1F9FDF2>

subject: Re: Hello Dear Partner
body:
Dear Ernest Francis Groth,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your offer and would like to learn more about the opportunity. Could you please provide me with some additional details? Specifically, I would like to know more about the funds you mentioned and how they were generated during your time in the oil and gas company.

Additionally, it would be helpful if you could explain further what you mean by needing the funds to be in the name of a third party. I want to make sure I have a clear understanding of the project before moving forward.

Regarding communication, do you have a preferred platform for chat? I am open to using various messaging apps or email, depending on what works best for you.

Thank you again for considering me for this opportunity. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Marilyn

subject: Re: Hello Dear Partner
body:
Dear Marilyn



I received your email and I want to assure you that this is a high profile
business and will be very successful and has no illegal implications
whatsoever as everything for the successful completion is well arranged and
there is no risk involved.



I think you should have a brief knowledge about the source of the funds.
Probably the history of fund origin will help you make an informed decision
and know exactly how you could handle the deal should you make up your mind
to be part of the process.


I would further like to introduce myself to you first before we proceed. My
name is Ernest Francis Groth. I was a financial Expert & Consultant and
worked with Hill House Capital Group, an Asia-based investment management
firm founded by Zhang Lei in 2005 with US$20 million in seed capital from
the Yale Endowment. Hill House has offices in New York, Beijing, Hong Kong
and Singapore. It invests globally, with a particular focus on Asia, (Hill
House Capital Group) with its Subsidiaries: Care Capital Advisors, HHGL 360
Buy Holdings, Ltd.

The origin of this fund is from an “over invoice” sale of Petroleum
products that amounted to $820 million USD and was moved from Hong Kong to
Barclays Bank Plc Private volt for safe keeping, after which I later
retired from the company and started running my own private business.

 I was able to secure these funds while I was working with Hill House
Capital Group as we are mainly Hedge Fund, Private Equity, Venture Capital.
I am the only person aware of this funds now as my other partner who was
aware died of covid-19 related complications.



Now the funds have been moved to an offshore bank in Dubai, United Arab
Emirates and placed in an Escrow Account as third party beneficiary funds.



This third party is assumed to be the supplier of petroleum products to my
previous company for which the invoice was raised to be paid. Now it is due
for the funds to be released by the bank according to the terms of deposit,
and I am ready to present you to the bank as the beneficiary of the funds.

 I believe with your response to my email I can trust you and have this
transaction done with you. I want to move these funds as investment funds
and I require your full cooperation for the success of the deal.

 I have made a breakthrough on how we can successfully move these funds to
you without any International monetary agency requesting huge taxes to be
paid upfront before the funds will be transferred to you.

All relevant legal documents for a backup of the funds are also available
from the bank and all transactions will be done via bank to bank
arrangements.

 I will be expecting to hear from you and if you have any further
questions, I am open to answer your questions.
Best Regards

Ernest Francis Groth

subject: Re: Hello Dear Partner
body:
Dear Ernest Francis Groth,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing all this information. I appreciate your trust in me and I'm interested to learn more about this opportunity. Could you please explain in more detail how the funds will be moved from the offshore bank in Dubai to my account? Also, what kind of investment are you proposing? I would like to understand the potential risks and returns involved.

Additionally, could you provide some references or testimonials from previous successful transactions? It would help me feel more confident about moving forward with this deal.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Marilyn

subject: Re: Hello Dear Partner
body:
Dear Marilyn

Thanks for your email response. I am retired and I do not have any specific
preferred area of investments. It all depends on what you can offer and
your area of specialization as well.

Below is the process of handing the funds over to you. I await your
feedback as you carefully go through all of them.

We are moving the funds via bank to bank. But there are important things
for you to know.

1. I informed you that this fund was made from an "Over-Invoicing" from my
previous company. So the fund was assumed to be a payment meant for a
customer of my previous company.
2. In depositing the funds to the bank, it was declared for third party
ownership, which means it does not belong to the depositor which is me. I
am only holding the funds in an escrow account in trust for the real owner
which is a third party.
3. Now I will introduce you to the bank as the third party owner, with a
letter of authorization to claim the funds from the bank.
4. With the MOU, Proof of Funds, My ID and the letter of authorization, you
will make a presentation to the bank for the release of the funds.
5. The bank will request for you to first open a non resident online
offshore with them. The money will first be moved from the escrow account
into your own account that you will open with the bank.
6. Once this process is completed, you can then begin to transfer the funds
to all designated accounts that we may choose and in any country of our
choice.
7. The only money to be involved in this deal is the money to be used to
open the account with the bank. Yet once we begin transfer of funds, we can
easily transfer the money back to us.

Please kindly study the above procedures very well and if you are ready to
join me, then let us proceed. If accepted, please kindly let me know so
that I can send the MOU to you for signing.

Thank you

Your faithfully
Ernest Francis Groth

subject: Re: Hello Dear Partner
body:
Dear Ernest Francis Groth,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing all the details regarding the funds transfer. I appreciate your trust in involving me in this process. I have carefully read through the procedures you mentioned, and I have a few follow-up questions before we proceed.

1. Could you please provide more information about the previous company from which these funds originated? It would be helpful to know more about their business and why they designated these funds for a third party.

2. What is the total amount of funds that are currently held in the escrow account? Understanding the magnitude of this transaction will help me assess its feasibility.

3. Can you explain further how opening a non-resident online offshore account with the bank works? Are there any specific requirements or fees associated with it?

Once I have a clearer understanding of these aspects, I will be able to make an informed decision about joining you in this endeavor. Please send me the MOU so that I can review it thoroughly.

Thank you again for considering me as a potential partner. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Marilyn

subject: Re: Hello Dear Partner
body:
Dear Marilyn

I acknowledge the receipt of your email with thanks.

First as I explained in my previous mail, there will be no need to refer
back to the company where the funds were made. I do not work for the
company anymore. Secondly, I clearly stated that the fund was made through
"over-invoicing", or what you may call "contract inflation". I partnered
with a colleague because we were in charge of financial disbursements at
our local unit, to increase the amounts to be paid to suppliers and
contractors, hence a third party is needed who will now be assumed to be
the "contractor or supplier" to my previous company. And this is where you
come in.

Secondly, the total amount involved as I also stated in my previous email
is Eight Hundred and Twenty Million US Dollars (USD820M).

Thirdly, Non Resident Online Account is an offshore account, to be opened
in your name without your visit or physical travel to the bank. It takes a
process. Once we have an agreement to work together, I shall recommend you
to the bankers with a letter of authority and the proof of funds documents.
Your personal data will be needed by the bank. You will also be required to
fill and sign the online account opening forms. An amount of money
representing account opening and activation deposit will be required by the
bank, which we shall contribute jointly to open and activate the account.

Then once the account is fully activated, the funds of USD820M will be
moved from the bank's escrow into your non-resident online account. We can
then begin to transfer the funds bit by bit to your designated account for
further disbursements to our investment projects.

I want to believe you should have full knowledge of the deal after going
through my explanations. I therefore wait for your urgent response so that
we can proceed.

Thank you.

Ernest Francis Groth

subject: Re: Hello Dear Partner
body:
Dear Ernest Francis Groth,

Thank you for your email and for providing me with more information about the deal. I appreciate your explanation regarding the funds and how they were inflated through a partnership with a colleague. It seems like quite an intricate process.

I understand that there is no need to refer back to the company where the funds were made since you no longer work there. Just to clarify, are you saying that I would be assuming the role of the contractor or supplier to your previous company? If so, what would be my responsibilities in this role?

Regarding the Non Resident Online Account, it's interesting to learn that it can be opened in my name without physically visiting the bank. Could you please explain more about how this process works? What kind of personal data would be needed by the bank, and what are the online account opening forms?

Additionally, you mentioned that an amount of money is required as an account opening and activation deposit. How much would this deposit be, and how would we contribute jointly to open and activate the account?

Lastly, I'm curious about our investment projects. Could you provide some details on what these projects entail?

Thank you for taking the time to answer my questions. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Marilyn

subject: Re: Hello Dear Partner
body:
Hello Marilyn

Thanks again for your email.

I will give you an authorization introductory letter when we get to that
stage, informing the bank that the funds in their custody belong to you as
the third party. That is all that will be required to transfer ownership to
you, backed up with the proof of funds documents.

The bank officer will direct you on how to open a non resident online
account. They will also be the ones to provide you with the account opening
forms and other related documents which you may need to sign before the
account will be opened.

As at the time of depositing the funds in the bank's escrow account, I was
duly informed that minimum account opening deposit of the bank is USD10.000

"Projects" in my last email refers to the area of investments in which you
propose to invest the funds when you finally receive the funds in your
account in your country.

Thank you .

Ernest Groth

subject: Re: Hello Dear Partner
body:
Hello Marilyn,

Thank you for your email. I appreciate the information you provided. It seems like there are some steps involved in transferring ownership of the funds to me. Could you please explain a bit more about the proof of funds documents? What kind of documents would be required?

Also, I'm curious about opening a non-resident online account. How does that work exactly? Will I be able to access and manage the account online from my country?

Lastly, you mentioned "Projects" in your previous email. Could you clarify what you mean by that? Are these investment opportunities or something else?

Best wishes,
Marilyn

subject: Re: Hello Dear Partner
body:
Hello Marilyn

Thanks again for your email.

I will give you an authorization introductory letter when we get to
that stage, informing the bank that the funds in their custody belong
to you as the third party. That is all that will be required to
transfer ownership to you, backed up with the proof of funds
documents.

The bank officer will direct you on how to open a non resident online
account. They will also be the ones to provide you with the account
opening forms and other related documents which you may need to sign
before the account will be opened.

As at the time of depositing the funds in the bank's escrow account, I
was duly informed that minimum account opening deposit of the bank is
USD10.000

"Projects" in my last email refers to the area of investments in which
you propose to invest the funds when you finally receive the funds in
your account in your country.

Thank you .

Ernest Groth

subject: Re: Hello Dear Partner
body:
Hello Ernest,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate your detailed explanation about the process involved in transferring ownership of the funds. Could you please clarify what specific documents would be required as proof of funds?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Marilyn

subject: Re: Hello Dear Partner
body:
Hello Dear Marilyn

Thanks for your immediate response to my email.

Due to age and ill health related issues, I recently contracted a
commercial broker in Dubai as I earlier informed you in one of my emails,
who will now assist in facilitating this deal as the new law of UAE from
2023 requires. The commercial broker company will be paid their full
commission as would be agreed when the deal is fully completed and funds
made available to your account in your country.

Please kindly contact my commercial broker with the details below and
inform him that you have a transaction with me, Ernest Francis Groth, and
wish to continue with the new process to receive the funds for our
investments.

The brokerage company details are as follows:

==================================================
Adnan C. Adams
Front Desk/Administrator
Boubyan Investments Commercial Brokers LLC
Dubai, United Arab Emirates
Email: bbinvestmentsllc@boubyaninvestmentllc-ae.com
بوبيان للاستثمار ذ م م ضبا ، الإمارات العربية المتحد
====================================================

Please keep me constantly updated as you progress with him.

Warm Regards and I do hope for the best

Ernest Groth.

subject: Re: Hello Dear Partner
body:
Hello Marilyn,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's good to hear that you have a commercial broker in Dubai assisting with the deal. I will contact Adnan C. Adams at Boubyan Commercial Brokers LLC as instructed and inform him of our connection.

I appreciate your update and will keep you informed of any progress made with Mr. Adams.

Best wishes,
Marilyn
